title: ellArkkum poduvAna
sahitya:
ellArkkum poduvAna nirguNa brahmattai idayattil vazhipADuvOm Om


anupallavi

  ellaiyillA ulagam engum uyirkk-uyirAm inbamaya shuDarai anbu malar sorindE


caraNam    jAti matam kaDanda sarvAtma samarasam sattiya nittiya saccidAnandamayam
bhEda rahitamAna jyOtip-paramporuLaip-piriyAda dhyAnattin uruvAga bhAvittE
